summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York to the Sacramento County Clerk/Recorder, commanding their appearance and production of documents for the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The subpoena requires appearance on November 29, 2021, at 40 Foley Square in New York City.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)), which is the subject of this subpoena.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Document Production
events.description: The Sacramento County Clerk/Recorder is commanded to appear before the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York to testify and produce documents related to the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: Sacramento County Clerk/Recorder, 5229 Hazel Avenue, Suite B, Fair Oaks, CA 95628
United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, 40 Foley Square, Manhattan, New York, NY
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on August 27, 2021, to the Sacramento County Clerk/Recorder for the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.
The subpoena demands the Clerk/Recorder's appearance and document production on November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square in New York.
The case referenced is United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, docket number 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
Failure to comply with the subpoena constitutes contempt of court and subjects the recipient to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
